page.title: 10The Badgers of Dartmoor
page.content: The extensive workings of{Foxhole {Mine}are now being reclaimed by the moor. Deep gullies, once the scene of industry are filled with growing heather and whortleberry. In this lonly part of the moor the badger can live undisturbed. If you follow the mine workings, easing your way through the gullies, and over the spoil heaps you may come upon a hole in the ground that is occupied by a badger. Then you have to be lucky and make sure the wind is blowing towards you as you wait for dusk. As the sky darkens and the ghosts of the tinners seem to touch you, you could see the black and white face of Brock peering shortsightedly and suspiciously out into the gathering dusk. Keep still and quite and you will see the badgers of Dartmoor.
